name: Life Skills
description: Real-world skills that last a lifetime. Learn by doing!

challenges.title: Letter Writer
challenges.description: Write a letter to a grandparent or relative. Address the envelope and mail it!
challenges.instructions:
1. Write your letter (draw pictures too!)
2. Put it in an envelope
3. Write the address on the front
4. Put a stamp on it
5. Mail it together!

challenges.title: Breakfast Chef
challenges.description: Make breakfast for yourself (with a grown-up nearby for safety).

challenges.title: Memory Master
challenges.description: Memorize a parent's phone number. Recite it from memory!

challenges.title: Lace Ace
challenges.description: Learn to tie your shoes by yourself. Do it 3 times in a row!

challenges.title: Table Setter
challenges.description: Set the table for dinner every night for a week. All by yourself!

challenges.title: Recipe Reader
challenges.description: Follow a simple recipe to make a snack. Read each step!
challenges.instructions:
Pick a simple recipe like:
- Ants on a log (celery + peanut butter + raisins)
- Fruit salad
- Trail mix
- Smoothie

challenges.title: Fold Master
challenges.description: Fold a whole basket of laundry. Make it neat!

challenges.title: Address Expert
challenges.description: Learn your full home address. Recite it from memory!
